title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.4 - Amount of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.4 - Amount of award

State Regulations

The annual award shall be an amount up to $15,000, but in
no event shall the award exceed the cost of attendance at the institution. Cost
of attendance shall mean tuition, required fees, books, transportation, room
and board, as those terms are defined in section
2200.2
(f) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2212.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
